data.text: The app is basically a facelift for your router home page, but it's missing dozens of standard router homepage settings such as hiding your network. Their equipment doesn't let you access the router settings without using the app which means you have limited options if you want to configure your network. Bring your own network equipment if you want a normal router that has full features.

I've complained about this nonsense before, but FIX IT! Ya'll have great tech, but you are SO slow fixing bugs and issues. I have to sign in FROM THE START periodically, even though I check the box TO STAY SIGNED IN! And ANY time I go back into the app I have to put my dumb fingerprint in, even though I was in the app 3 seconds ago! It's the greatest (not) when the sign in completely starts at the beginning! (Not.)
data.replyText: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us. Sorry to hear that your app is not working correctly. For direct support, please reach out to us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or visit our community located at https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: The update has bugs. It's so irritating. Wouldn't even recognize my credentials. Using a browser I had no issues logging in so that narrowed it down to the app. Simple tasks take a long time, forget being able to contact support or doing anything else for that matter, it's not happening. You can pay your bill no problem, which I guess was the priority. Gotta get paid first. If I could rollback I'd do it in a heartbeat. This is how the cookie crumbles and I guess now we wait for the fix.

I love Spectrum and their services. I had AT&T before this and my God was it awful! Spectrum has came out quickly to resolve the issue I had on 2 occasions. They swapped out equipment and ran new wiring to completely eradicate any issues immediately. Other than those 2 times, we have had zero issues. I have multiple services with them because it turns out to be cheaper to have more services.

Updated no longer works. Deleted reinstalled does not work. Tried 3 other devices. Does not work. In all cases will not even open!..... Unavailable often after midnight when I need to use it. Please add Amazon, Hulu, Disney, Paramount Apps in the Appstore. It's very convenient having Netflix and YouTube in the menu. Would be great and actually makes me value my cable when searching on another app that does not have a cable available show!
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear about any issues with the Spectrum TV app. For direct assistance, please contact us by private message on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum), Twitter (https://twitter.com/ask_spectrum). To ask a question or provide additional feedback, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/categories/troubleshooting-the-spectrum-tv-app ^RJR

data.text: Like the fact that I can see and control what devices are connected to my wifi and pause or unpause it's use. Able to check on just about everything or anything I need to. Keep up the good work Spectrum!! Update::: app not working for me. No equipment showing up nor what's connected. Unable to view anything using the app. Very frustrated at this point!!
data.replyText: We're thrilled the app is meeting your expectations. Thanks so much for the excellent rating and for being a Spectrum customer! ^PB

data.text: App Has Bug?! app keeps force closing due to having a bug??! it says to Uninstaller the app then reinstall it once the developer has provided an update that fixes the bug! additionally I've noticed lately that it won't recognize my face when I open the app and try to login. but other apps at the same time with the same lighting have no issues with biometrics. also get notifications of new devices logging in for the first time but there won't be any new devices listed; just my device (×8)??!

While away for work, I anticipated watching subscribed channels on your app. However, I encountered unexpected blackouts. This initial experience is disheartening, especially when other providers don't impose such restrictions. As a frequent traveler, the inability to access paid channels makes me consider exploring alternative services. I hope for improvements to reconsider my subscription with Spectrum.

App doesn't show my services on the homepage anymore, only the option to buy more. Chat bot always responds "oops, error try again" after prompting about experiencing connection issues to Internet. But will tell me I'm not in an outage, then I'll call spectrum and be told I'm in an outage. The app is awful for troubleshooting or managing your services. It's just ads to buy more of spectrum services.

I hate Spectrum. They always tryna over charge, add a fee, increase the price, and add an extra fee. It's always something. You talk to customer service, they tell you one thing, and when you call back to follow up on it when its a problem, it's "I don't see that in the notes." If I could switch to VZ, I would, but they are not in my area. so, unfortunately, I have to deal with Spectrum until then.
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: This app gets worse with each update. Now, you can't access voicemail natively as it launches a browser session to a web page that does not render well for mobile devices. On top of that, the sign on process is terrible. It doesn't work with biometrics very well and prompts me to log on all the time rather than remember my credentials and biometric setting. I'd give this app 0 stars if it was possible.
data.replyText: Hello Ken. I am sorry you were not able to reach us. I am sorry for the frustration. For direct support we can  be reached  on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or on Twitter (https://twitter.com/ask_spectrum)  When contacting us, please mention that you are contacting us about your "My Spectrum App review". ^JR

data.text: It's a useless app. I have no ability to get into the router settings and configure them. Chat is worthless. Help articles are worthless. What was the actual point of this app besides being able to pay your bill? Ha! Now it's useless for paying the bill as well. It lost my credentials. It doesn't even recognize the biometrics.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear about this issue and would love to see how we can help. Please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussion/169249/troubleshooting-issues-with-the-my-spectrum-app to find answers to common issues or you can post additional feedback or ask a question so we can help you resolve the issue. ^MG

data.text: We have spectrum wifi/ internet for about three months since that time everyday the wifi locks up or freezes two to three times a day it getting old. Had a new router brought to us. Lady told us that should fix the problem. Went out last night lady on phone refreshed signal lasted about three hours and then today it's done it three times. Don't think we want spectrum if we're having all this junk going on.

Not happy with the new app. It's trash and runs super slow. Cannot see my router or the devices connected to it as it says 0 connected when I'm connected to the wifi and so is a TV. The old app was better and had no issues so idk why yall would fix something that never needed to be fixed. Edit : I already contacted support and yall didn't fix anything.
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: This app was required to install new cable boxes that replaced old ones. One required link led to "error, page not found" and going back took you out of set up to how much you owed. This did not work for us, so very slow that screen timed out several times. When using chat feature app was not responding, just the search symbol for extended time leading to loss of chat connection. Was expecting more due to hype of how great the app was.

data.text: Works, but very slow. It is one of the slowest responding apps on my phone. At least 4 times slower than most apps. Often seems frozen and then starts to work. Of course using Spectrum internet isn't helping considering it is also unreliable. Furthermore, they make it so you cannot downgrade your cable. You can only upgrade. They really are one of the worst and most greedy companies I've ever known.

data.text: The My Spectrum App is great. Easy to navigate and user friendly. The Spectrum Internet and WiFi is another story ... my connection fails/disconnects on average of, at the least, once a week, requiring me to troubleshoot and work till I get the system up and running again. This is quite annoying and would lead me to choose another provider, but, at this time, Spectrum is my only option.
data.replyText: Sorry you are having trouble, if you need direct support, please reach out to us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or visit our community located at https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^MG

data.text: If you can connect to the app then: Trouble shooting is limited to just reboot the device. Just went through the automated please reboot all your equipment messages and blame everything but their service and was surprised to have a real person connect with me in the chat. She was nice and pleasant but unable to fix the issue but was able to schedule a technician to look at it in a couple of days. Much better but I still wouldn't recommend Spectrum. I wish I had another choice.

data.text: This app makes me so livid. Every time I watch something on TV to relax I can't even do that cause I have to constantly get up to restart the stupid modem and router! I was happier when I was just using a free antenna to watch roku. Every week I have issues and have to reboot my equipment which was recently replaced so it's up to date but spectrum needs to improve the service especially with what you charge for wifi. If it wasn't for the package deal I got I would not pay for this service!

Is the lack of attention to this obviously poor functioning app indicative of attention to customers. I need this app to work.

data.text: horrible app. takes forever to load. the UI is not friendly. the lack of control options for my router are abysmal!! have to Uninstall and reinstall on a semi regular basis. my 1GB internet constantly drops to under 300, at times under 100, and only sometimes runs in the 700s. even at my fastest speed, this app still either doesn't load at all or takes forever to load. just today having to reinstall because when logging in the last 3 days all I get is a white screen. ridiculous!!

BUT I am moving and the app & browser requires we sign-out then sign in to view different address info. The app keeps directing me to sign-in via browser but won't load anything on the app itself anymore. Update 1/18: App keeps crashing. Tried uninstalling/reinstall, changed nothing. Playstore also has a note saying the "app is crashing on similar devices". What the heck?

data.text: Watching on Roku TV. App randomly freezes and buffers a lot. Must go to the guide & select the show I'm watching to refresh. Several channels will sometimes not match the sound with the picture. I already communicated thru FB messenger & they forwarded the issue to tech but haven't heard of a resolution and still having this issue. It is ridiculous we are directed to use another app for support. I don't use X (Twitter). Other issues but limited on space here. No issues on other streaming apps.

data.text: One of the most useless apps. "Want to restart your device online? Follow these steps!" Only to be told to press the button on the front. I think if that worked I wouldn't be IN THE APP looking for a solution. "Send a refresh to your device" and still have to call customer service to actually refresh. Regardless of their service, this app is useless.

cell signal is very spotty and low 80% of the time no matter where you are. Internet is the same as the cell signal even if you're in the same room as the equipment. I have the latest version of the router and modem. cable is fine, but the price is high for everything, considering the slow lagging internet and phone and channel package you get. Don't get me started on the customer serve you get when you have to go to any of the stores for something. horrible attitudes, extremely rude behavior!!!
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: Been a long time customer with spectrum. Not only do I not get what I pay for in the internet department but they're pretty pricey and it seems like every month when I pay my bill my internet goes off and on after payment was made. Are the creators of this app still in high-school cause it's pretty much broke or what's really going on guys... edit: 2 years later and the app is still completely unresponsive at times it works when it wants to. Do better!!!

Spectrum has the best internet in my area. High speed, very infrequent connectivity issues (perhaps once every few months for an hour or so), and when connectivity issues are expected, you are notified of the time window, most often in advance, via the app. The price is okay, but I was unhappy that there was a price hike previously after 2 years of use, and I canceled my subscription immediately. They were wise enough to return the price to its original price, which is why I resubscribed.

Spectrum is alright. This app? TERRIBLE. Horrible. Awful. Just plain bad. You click on an option and it takes at LEAST 15 seconds to change to that option. Even just clicking the "back" button does the same thing. And that's when it's working at all. Most times it willl pop up and say the my spectrum app is not responding. Close app or wait. You'd think that a company dedicated to internet and technology, would come up with a way to fix this. Anyone notice their website is the same? It's AWFUL!

data.text: Won't load on any of my devices anymore. Just says "unable to complete service request" can't even login. EDIT: I didn't say it's not opening, it opens just fine. My issue is once it opens it just loads and loads and loads til it says "unable to complete service request" I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling and that didn't work on all of my devices.
data.replyText: Sorry to hear that the app won't open, uninstalling and reinstalling the app typically resolves this issue. If you need direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions and post a question so we can investigate ^JF

data.text: App is slow, has a tendency to crash if you close it and reopen it, and generally unhelpful when it comes to internet outages. On the topic of internet outages, Spectrum is the only ISP available in my apartment. It still boggles my mind how much they jack up the price after a year to still have near daily connection issues and outages.

data.text: Constantly have issues with the app taking FOREVER to even load. Now both this app AND the Spectrum Tv app , which I use daily have both been down for days and I can't watch any of my shows. My Bill keeps jumping higher and higher for the worst service. There are also constant outages.Seriously ready to cancel and just use streaming services from individual networks/channels

This app feels like an afterthought. It worked well for maybe one or two years but recently it's been absolutely terrible. I can't even access the billing page and the services page reports we have nothing under spectrum. I have to go to the website to do anything I would do in the app, essentially negating the app. This is what you get time and time again when a company hires some basement app programmer to make their app instead of doing their research and hiring somebody who's competent.

data.text: The worst customer service ever! Rude and treat people like their stupid. I know my internet speeds and how internet works. I didn't want an app I want a cable box. Apparently thats not allowed. It's a zumo device that has apps. Like my TV. Like my gaming system. Like my phone. Like every other device in my house. Can't rewind, can't pause, can't record, no easy guide access. I'll be switching to satellite asap. Cable is obsolete for these reasons. Your doing it to yourself spectrum.

data.text: Way too much time to load. Many glitches and its frustrating being connected to their own Wi-Fi and it still takes 10 minutes to log in. Trying to pay takes even longer. I have to disconnect from their network and use my cellular network and pay through that. The service is great and fast but this app needs a lot of work. We just fixed it no more than 2 hours ago and the problem came back

data.text: Update is just terrible. Beyond terrible. It's horrible. Update lost login credentials after last update. App doesn't work, get 'page not found' for many links. Chat doesn't work, speed test won't run, and continually asks me to log in to continue. There is no reason for this, just poor planning by your team.
data.replyText: Sorry you are having trouble with logging in, if you need direct support, please reach out to us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or visit our community located at https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: It is too challenging to transfer from another vendor with a cell phone and setup. Getting a security code is challenging. Installed too much a hurry and didn’t check the internet or complete set-up or take time to review everything. Then, you have to use a different person and process for cell setup. There were more calls to Spectrum that I won't get into. May return to original vendor. It was much simpler, even if it was a little more expensive. Granted, it didn't have cell phone service.

Would not recommend this service to anyone. This service just seems like a money scam. You pay money, but it rarely works. And the price just keeps increasing! Having to constantly restart the equipment, and sometimes it takes an hour to work again. And this happens every single week. There has to be something better. Because complaining does nothing. I can't even use wifi at home most of the time. When I wake up AND get home from work, the equipment has to be restarted. It's ridiculous!

I am a snowbird and get new service every season. Spectrum has tons of technical issues....defective equipment usually....I spend hours on the phone with them to find out ultimately the equipment is bad.....they send out a tech the next day and then sometimes everything works. Now they have zumo which doesn't work very well.....I already had it replaced after 1 day. It does not work as well as the old cable box. Not very satisfied....If I wanted to stream everything I could have tried Frontier..
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: None of your apps are working!!!!!!!! Sam s22 ultra!!! Edit: i figured it out on my own in a few minutes. I am 100% this saved me many hours with support.. who would have just made things worse. And i am absolutely floored that its almost 2024 and the app doesn't support 5.1 audio. Are you serious? It's actually worthless then. The only service without 5.1 audio (and i have ALL of them) and it is by far the most expensive. Max dropping down to just HD from 4k HDR soon is the last straw.

data.text: Loved that I could set pause schedules for my teenagers, and manually pause just their devices as needed. Now the app randomly deletes my device groups and shows all my devices as miscellaneous ip-esque strings of numbers and ":" so I can't tell which ones are theirs, and randomly changes my WiFi password and name back to the ones on the router. No matter how often I change things back and set my groups and WiFi pause schedules back up it only lasts 1-3 weeks before it undoes itself.

data.text: Ever since the latest update, the app just does a loading screen forever when I try to access devices connected to my router. It is shutting off internet to my devices after certain times and I can't make it stop. I've spoken to support 3 times. I've reinstalled app. Tried using the app on a different phone. Nothing works. Please fix!

This app is so janky, but at least it shows Spectrum's consistent throughout their entire company. Usually consistency is good. Unfortunately, all of my experiences with this company have been consistently dog💩. This app is full of bugs, doesn't work half of the time, and when it does it takes forever to load. I would avoid this company all together. Back to update and they charged me an extra $20 for an unapproved upgrade. Still can't get Internet service in most of my house.

data.text: EDIT: I finally got to bill payment. Apparently when the app updated the sign in the previous version was using was a "guest account". I logged out, went to "forgot my username" and logged in with the username I was sent and now the app works like normal. TL;DR Log out, go to forgot username, sign in with that username. After new update app is unusable. Everything I go to says error. Can't pay bills. Can't look at bills. Can't look at services. Useless. Why have an app at all.

data.userName: R O C R O C
data.text: Poorly engineered. You have to reset your start options every time you turn on TV. For example, if you want to see your favorite channels you have reselect every time. When you do select your favorites, they appear several times on your list. That is just the start. I would just hire new people and start over. The ones they have now can't do the job.

It used to work fine before and I usually logged in with biometrics, now not only does that not work anymore or my account, but when I try to register (thinking maybe my account got deleted or something and check), none of the features or options work, can't verify by phone, email, account #. I can't use the app anymore.
data.replyText: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us. Sorry to hear that your app is not working correctly. For direct support, please reach out to us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or visit our community located at https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: The best way, in my opinion, to deal with spectrum. It's super easy to pay bills, check status of equipment and services, and chat with a customer service representative anytime. They respond quickly and help with whatever you need. Also the app will notify you asap if there is an outage in the area or any issues will be coming up soon. which is super convenient and good to know. I've never had any app issues. So I definitely recommend it if you have spectrum.

Everything spectrum is doing is bad. I can't stand it anymore every month the price has been hiking up. Also On Demand makes you watch 130 sec commercials and then it don't keep your time watched correct so you'll need to watch the 130 seconds again. Better start crossing your fingers that it goes back to where you were watching the movie. Paying way too much to be having issues with anything. Hell with this company.

Spectrum access point network certificate is not being pushed to my new S24 automatically. The option to connect is not my wifi settings like it should. I keep being told to download this app to help with connecting to it, but there is no option that helps.
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: The My Spectrum app was pleasant to use. Without any glitches or hang ups in the acct set up, as well as paying my two accounts. My Sunday morning is off to an awesome start. I am pretty much broke now, but actually I feel positive and happy. I know it sounds funny ....the My Spectrum app set up and processing was very satisfying to me. I'm happy because everything went so smoothly and I didn't stress out at all. I feel calm and at peace. Have a Blessed day everyone at Spectrum.

charter internet service if I could have anyone but this company I would. customer service Representatives don't want to help. when there's issues in the whole entire County they refuse to make tickets to take a look at towers. they want to put additional charges to your account and the problems never get fixed. I hope this company goes under and someone else can take over that does a better job.

Even paying for 300mpb speed, I still have severe buffering. To make the experience even worse is the app inability to recognize my home wifi when I'm using my phone to connect with Spectrum. It seems to be getting worse instead of getting better.
data.replyText: We're sorry that you're having issues with your internet service and we would like to help. Please contact us on Facebook (facebook.com/spectrum), Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or visit our customer Community (https://community.spectrum.net) so we can help provide you with a solution. ^RJR

data.text: Update done in February ruined the app. When opening the app it auto starts at channel 784. Scrolling down to 100's to check schedules, it automatically goes back to 784 again. Very inconvenient!
data.replyText: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us. Sorry to hear that your app is not working correctly. For direct support, please reach out to us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or visit our community located at https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: This is much easier than going to the website, typing in your username, password, etc. I used to call in to make my payment where they charge you $4.95 to make a payment. Here I just click a few buttons and I'm done. I'm very happy with the app!

This app brings nothing but frustration some day one, it is lagging, buggy and it's very difficult to navigate. Very hard to load most stuff in this stupid app. I can't even check my bill and when I finally go through I can't check out my the descriptions of my bill. I hate it and will go back to at&t soon
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: Everything about is counter-intuitive. When you finally sort it out, you discover that pretty much nothing works. Create a pause schedule? No, doesn't actually "pause". Try to pay? No, can't actually send them money. Reset devices? No, the devices just sit there useless as most everything Spectrum is. Utterly and completely useless in every way. Don't even bother. 2/18: good grief, it gets worse and worse... Spectrum billed me for NOT using them. What a bunch of A-holes. Shameful.
data.replyText: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us. Sorry to hear that your app is not working correctly. For direct support, please reach out to us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or visit our community located at https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: They took the very useful TWC app and removed features. The latest update has stripped most features from the app and replaced them with links to the Spectrum website, with the added bonus that several of the links are broken. This is an example of the opposite of what a developer should be doing.

Changed my review from, 5 stars to one. Spectrum sucks, was watching the Superbowl on ch10, it gliched just as game went into overtime, ch 10 disappeared, searching for Superbowl nothing came up, unplugged cake box ch-10 was still gone, finally searched for CBS and was listed as "tracker" ???, after selecting it the game came up. Brought up the guide ch10 still didn't show, talked with other on spectrum and they all had problems to various degrees.

Handy little app, takes up very limited space & really does try to put all your account at your fingertips in little more than a glance! So much more practical than constantly having to deal with calling customer service each time, & hoping to find someone who actually speaks English & without an indiscernible accent!! And! –not having to be on hold listening to endless elevator musack, or fighting with a virtual assistant computer voice just to pay a simple cable bill every month! Worth it!😉

Terrible experience. Spectrum forces installation of a mobile app as the only way to configure the router (which has its host of security concerns.) Just leave it in the web browser so laptop users can also use it. To top it all, the app is terrible for the task of configuring the device. Doesn't work.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, we will forward your feedback to the location. If you need direct support or want to ask a question, please contact us on Facebook (facebook.com/spectrum), Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or visit our customer Community (https://community.spectrum.net).

data.text: Not working correctly for my Android phone anymore. iPhones are good. But I don't have one. Thanks spectrum. Had a much of settings on it that I could not change without a factory reset of my router. Just wonderful. Maybe fix it for Android users. Much appreciated!
data.replyText: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us. Sorry to hear that your app is not working correctly. For direct support, please reach out to us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or visit our community located at https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: original deal was amazing price that I could afford.. after deal was done (about a yr later) pricing was about doubled before I was able to find any additional discounts to add.. other than that service and internet is pretty stable on my phone.. home internet seems to go down at least a couple hrs every other month or so tho.

They are ok, too many interruption or outages. And they say free when you move, no fee but got charged after 2yrs when i moved and price just keeps getting higher every 6-9months. Can't afford $89. For 300gb when T-MOBILE offers it for $50. 🤷🏻‍♀️ And did not get told that i needed to change the address on my ACP 1st. 😡.so sorry but I'm done with spectrum going pay what i owe and done🙏🏻

Frustrating it does not open at the top of the channel guide it opens up in HD numbers, 1000 and 2000 nu.ber series. I want it to open at the top, channel 1. I also cannot use all the channels I PAY FOR In my package when I travel away from my house. I pay enough money for cable package I have, I should get them all on my app!
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: I switched from att uverse to spectrum several months ago, and I am very pleased. spectrum connection is very dependable and at least 175.00 less than att uverse. i have tons of wifi equipment, which would affect my att connections. i haven't had any problems with slow connections. their cust serv is also better. you can actually speak to a live person 24/7, and the reps are always pleasant, patient, knowledgeable, and professional. the only thing I regret is not switching years ago.

You dont have to download the app to configure your router. They are intentionally misleading you on their website by ommitting a link to the web page and only including the app store link Edit: Turns out their new router locks down the router completely and forces you to download the app. What the hell??

Support section for assistance and feedback is an automated response and limits questions to ask about billing or malfunctions anything else is blocked out by spectrum repeating the same 3 questions. Cannot discuss anything with anyone without actually calling spectrum. Cannot configure router anymore like before. Only good for paying bill and checking router/ rebooting
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: Need more information on channels and the basic that I pay. Also do not need four dvrs. I need one. How do I fix that? These fees are getting way too expensive cannot pay much longer must look for new provider unless you can lower my monthly bill. I am a senior citizen, hard of hearing, a widow. my income will not be able to afford high fees. Any suggestions. Need to hear from you soon.only watch certain cable channels and the normal basic ones Email me please no phone calls. Thank you.
data.replyText: I do apologize for this inconvenience. You can go to a Spectrum store and make changes to the account and return equipment. ^RJR

data.text: I got Spectrum mobile phone service to save money; However, I have had nothing but problems since day one! For two months my daughter and I can't call each other, I had to send a new SIM card to her. I would recommend the public to stay with your original carrier to prevent hardships of paying for a useless phone service and all the stress of just to save extra money.

surprisingly reliable, helpful and even followed through on sending me a 100$ gift card that I was able to use for whatever I needed no problem. if you are still not convinced here is a little booster. My phone company was charging me 75$ a month for regular all in one unlimited phone service. Spectrum was offering for me to switch for 20$ a month. long story short, told my phone company. Lowered my bill to 50 a month, added a line and sent me a free phone. Thanks to Spectrum offer.

I don't have auto pay turned on. After paying my bill, they took it upon themselves to do an additional unauthorized charge. They are claiming it is not showing up in their system. It has clearly been taken from my debit card. That is theft. So tired of this company. I will not be reaching out again as all the company has done is create more of a headache. I will be doing a chargeback with my bank. Other customers be aware, they'll make unauthorized transactions to your card.
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: Well I normally only pay max $20/$25 for wifi, got to pay $60 here. I will say the quality of the signal is impeccable. Never any interruptions in service. And when I went to get my equipment the girl in the office or main store was really quite pleasant to talk to. Was an enjoyable experience. Should have gotten her name. ;-)

Saves a lot of time, and set-up still takes some time but you don't have to wait on the phone with an agent. App is very useful but I see some room for improvement, mostly the menu system, sorry no specific examples.

we still have a problem with the TV with it going out a lot. it has to buffer a lot. I just don't understand why? I've been at this address for 21 years now. I live by the airport but have been told that it has nothing to do with how bad the service has been for in my area for 21year I have had multiple service techs over the years and all they do is rewire the house just like all the services techs had done before him. other than one tech that hooked up a amplifier about 15 years ago or so.
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: This company is a joke, every time I turn around my bill goes up. Reset my Internet and somehow they added Voice to my package (never picked a package with this on it due to not having a home phone). Tried to call in and resolve the issue which led to them telling me I'd be charged more if I took the Voice service off.

Not crazy about the little price hike, but have had a good overall experience over the last few years with customer service and the app is user-friendly. I like that I can reboot my equipment from the app itself when necessary

Spectrum app is just fine !! Spectrum service sucks !! I enjoy my spectrum cable !!! My Spectrum Internet hasn't worked in over 2 years and only spiratucally worked before then !! My wife and myself work remote often and so we got Google Fiber years ago to have a stable Internet service !! And I've spent hours and hours on the phone with foreign Spectrum reps that have been of NO HELP WHATSOEVER !!!! Occasionally I'll get a domestic rep that has been of assistance during outages, but that's over

Has helped me with a lot of navigating with certain issues, always courteous and respectful, very understanding and accommodating when it comes to financial discrepancies, I never once has made me feel like a customer I feel like I'm family and they're trying to help me at every turn if need be. five stars all the way I would recommend to any first-time cable/mobile users.

I have had no real issues with Spectrum except for the occasional outage due to updates or power. I do wish they would notify by by email or text when these interruptions are planned to occur or are occurring.

Would give 0 stars if i could. The ONLY reason anyone buys this is because they've bought the area and prevent literally any other internet companies from providing service to said area. I work from home and the amount of outages when i pay $100 every month, and even early, the internet is incredibly unreliable at best and doesn't work at worst. I can't frickin pay y'all if y'all keep me from being able to worn because your shotty wifi. Fix it if you're going to call yourselves providers.
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: The price is rising with inflation, but the offerings are relatively stable. DVR is invaluable. Cable channels are plentiful. Demand channels are easily accessible. Wi-Fi is dependable with moderately quick fix times. Phone works perfectly. Aside from cost hikes and lack of discounts or promos for customers, Spectrum is a top tier cable, internet Wi-Fi, and phone service provider.

For no legitimate reason... Spectrum has removed the NHL ticket/package (which I have paid and am subscribed too) from the online/app channel guide. I have, in the past, been able to see the listed game/program and set the record option via the app...which "was" incredibly convenient on nights when I have to work late. I would then be able to watch the pre-recorded game on the DVR (which I also "pay" for) later that evening. Please explain why paying customers should no longer have this option
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: I hate the new forced update, I'm constantly logged all the way out to the point I can't use my biometric because it delete my option to use it, so if I am not constantly in my app it goes to deep sleep and remove my options to use my fingerprints and the new inter face is ugly and doing too much... The simple use is just fine.

The channel selection is great, unless their in disappoint over the rates with a network. then your inundated with politics. the network is doing this just to mess with you the customer. We chose you Charter/Spectrum to represent and provide the services to charge handsomely for. increasing more often than the price of gas goes up, except that price can fall.. unlike Spectrums.

no problems so far except wifi is a lil choppy on the phone, no biggy. ps4 wifi seems to run well, always giving auto updates as soon as the power goes out. whether or not its their doing, or the power went out they let me know whats up... pretty cool, i dig it...better than centurylink thats for sure.

my spectrum app is fine to pay my bill. when it comes to setting up your cable and getting your price, what is your bill going to be each month a couple of months later it jumps to hundred and something because of all these different changes they don't tell you about bad way to train your customer service and they beat you getting upset. my bill was supposed to be under $80 for the package I have why I'm paying over $115 😒. But I have a trick for that.

the app is fairly easy to use, it's helpful for restarting equipment and changing the wifi password. spectrum service is over priced, they led lied about the monthly amount, I'm downgrading to internet only soon, I basically only use TV to watch football and even that service has been awful.

Wow you guys really went and broke this entire app with the latest update/revamp. It was working fine, no problems. Now it doesn't stay logged in, and if it does log in it doesn't load anything. Not using a VPN, not a device problem, 100% the app.
data.replyText: Thanks for taking the time to share your experience with us. Sorry to hear that your app is not working correctly. For direct support, please reach out to us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or on Facebook (m.me/Spectrum) or visit our community located at https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: You can't downgrade without a rep. First they didn't tell us that my ultra internet was going up to $85. They also tried to send me a xumo box saying it was free the forst month and charged me $165 and I had not even activated it. I returned it without activating. Because I found out they raised the prices I tried to downgrade but it is not an option unless ypure in a life chat with an agent for them to do it for you. The app never works. Bad experience all over

This app constantly needs to be updated. If you rely on paying your bill with this app, you'll end up paying late fees. When it needs to be updated, it loses functionality. No reminders, no reliably taking payment. Apps like these should just stick to being website.
data.replyText: For direct support, please visit https://community.spectrum.net/discussions ^JF

data.text: I'm a college student who has online classes every semester. I have failed 2 final exams and had to appeal to the University of Memphis School Board to let me retake them on campus because Spectrum internet will go out for a couple seconds for no reason and then start back up a few second later. This happens everyday. also, when I reported issues, they were good at sending a technician to help but it took 5 times for me to get a "level 3" technician to come help. I wish I could say more.
data.replyText: We're sorry that you're having issues with your internet service and we would like to help. Please contact us on Facebook (facebook.com/spectrum), Twitter (https://twitter.com/Ask_Spectrum) or visit our customer Community (https://community.spectrum.net) so we can help provide you with a solution. ^RJR

data.text: While some options are easy to use it's not completely user friendly. What you are looking for is probably there, but you will probably click through all of the options a few times before you find it and may even give up in frustration only to find it later.
